price: Em absoluto, não o são! Mas, o que eles cometiam lhes enferrujou os corações.
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
